comments:
Build 040304 IBM JRE 1.4.2 SuSE

Again, this is a confidential project (please come and see me for it). When I 
open a .hpp or .cpp file from the C/C++ Projects View, it is displayed in the 
editor but nothing shows up in the Outline Viewer.  This is often reproducible 
but not consistently. Sometimes it works (but fewer than failures).

I get 2 stack dumps when I reproducible the bug (For 1), I got ~20 of them. For 
2), I only got it once):

Fixed as a side effect of optimization and solution of another problem.
Files in projects now load much faster and no exceptions are found.

Verified Eclipse 200406111814  CDT 2004061803

But it was verified a while.
